item.title: 神梦颂
item.description: ::: tabs @tab 中文 《神梦颂》 一梦醒来以千年，梦中神寄托万事。 杯酒在手谁堪交， 仗剑江湖梦以远。 @tab 英文 《A Dream’s Song》 Awakening from a dream spanning a thousand years, In that dream the gods placed all things. With wine cup in hand, who dares to make a toast? With sword in hand, my dreams roam far on rivers and lakes.
